channel.title: [pi]dragon spec claws spec[pi]
channel.description: Can anyone help me with dragon claws. My d claws do the perfect hit ect ect but when i put my dragon claws on the spec doesnt show. If i put a melle weapon on with spec then dragon claws the spec shows i go spec and then it specs but the spec bar stays highlighted but the spec doesnt show it drains 50% but it does but you have to click spec again it shows it highlighted for spec but it isnt. Then my dragon claws work only on npcs but not people can anyone help.

item.title: [pi]dragon spec claws spec[pi]
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:


case 14484: // Dragon claws
				c.startAnimation(6000);
				c.doubleHit = true;
				c.usingClaws = true;
				c.specAccuracy = 6.50;
				c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
			break;

CombatAssistant.java

after i spec my spec bar doesnt show it drains
when i put d claws spec doesnt show unless i put a melle wep on before it with spec
